statements: UPDATE fashion_inventory SET price = 25.99, quantity = 100 WHERE item_id = '7b7cdec1-58d4-4e77-a7da-1565e7822d3b';

UPDATE orders SET total_amount = total_amount - 50.25, order_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE order_id = 1001;
